description:
At Ableton I was part of the Ableton.com Team inside the Customer Experience Unit, which focuses on developing and improving product tours, blog articles, learning materials and many other parts of the ableton.com website.

I was also an active member of the Web Accessibility Working Group, which works on improving the accessibility of the website and domain.

projects.name: Ableton.com
projects.description:
Release of the product tours for Ableton Note, Ableton Push 3 and Ableton Live 12.

Constant improvement of pages and components in several places, with a focus on usability and accessibility.

Creation, maintaining and documentation of new WebComponents inside the design system.

Refactoring of Django HTML Templates into WebComponents, transformation of legacy Javascript function into OOP Classes and SASS legacy styles into SCSS utility classes and BEM blocks.

Integration of features using TTD in Python.

Implementation of NPS Survey components into Emarsys with communication to Zendesk.

Conception and implementation of AB test scenarios.

Support and integration of a domain wide Accessibility Audit with an external agency.
